<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Mastodon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=668)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Not to be confused with the larger mammoth, mastodons are primeval elephants who dwell predominantly in temperate forests. There, they travel in close-knit social groups and feed on the forest vegetation.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Elephant_Mastodon.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Mastodon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=668)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +17; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +0

**Con** +5

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +17 

</row>

**HP** 175

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 45 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tusk +21 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+12 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
trunk +21 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** grabbing trunk

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +21 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+12 bludgeoning

**Dual Tusks** <actions string="Single Action" />  The mastodon makes two tusk Strikes, each against a different creature. This counts as one attack for the mastodon's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.

**Grabbing Trunk**   A Medium or smaller creature hit by the mastodon's trunk is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20). If the mastodon moves, it can bring the grabbed creature along with it.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Large or smaller, foot, DC 27

</column>
